content.rendered:
Talk of the Town

A print campaign aimed at mega-brands during Grand Kerala Shopping Festival

Grand Kerala Shopping Festival (GKSF) is an annual shopping event conducted by Kerala Tourism to convert the entire state into a giant shopping mall, incorporating not just the big players, but also the small and medium scale industries. Malayala Manorama wanted to tell advertisers that to cash in on this action, they will have to advertise with them.
